name: Childhood Memories (fazlibalkan)
description:
Childhood Memories

You are 12 and lost! Will you be able to find all the items that are seems to tell you a story? Try to collect the items and enjoy the story! This game is developed in GATES Summer Game Jam 2020.

Art
Mehmet Emin Sarıhan
Sercan Uysal

Code
Fazlı Balkan

Music
Gizem Aydın

Scenario
Gökçe Gamlı
